body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently the workflow retention garrulity is days, we should allow reasonable garrulity, e.g. hours

comments.body: I think this is the only place where we still have hardcoded measure unit but DB, I believe, uses correct data type.

I’m not sure what the implication is if user specify a very small retention like a few seconds. Will it cause replication to fail?
maybe we should only allow non-global namespace (those does not enable replications) to have small retention (less than 1 day)?

title: Allow fine grained workflow retention
